allow: Bash(powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "& ''C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community\Common7\Tools\Launch-VsDevShell.ps1''; cd ''C:\Users\Aurora\Projects\GW2Radial''; msbuild GW2Radial.sln /t:Build /p:Configuration=Debug /p:Platform=x64 /v:minimal /nologo")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add Template Wheel feature for Build + Equipment template switching

This commit adds a new Template Wheel that allows quick switching between
Build and Equipment template combinations with combat queuing support.

Features:
- 9 configurable template combo slots with custom helmet icons
- Action chain system for sequential Build + Equipment template switching
- Combat queuing with visual timer indicator
- User-configurable visibility/usability conditions (Default/Underwater/On Water/WvW)
- Custom ordering and priority controls
- Seamless integration with existing wheel system

Technical changes:
- Added TemplateWheel class with support for action chains
- Enhanced WheelElement with customBehaviorKeepProps for hybrid custom/props logic
- Added public props() getter/setter to WheelElement
- Implemented props enforcement to ensure combat queuing works correctly
- Added 9 helmet icon resources (IDR_TEMPLATE1-9)
- Modified action chain queuing to support immediate queue clearing
- Added support for custom behavior as pre-check (AND) vs override (OR)
